languages.text: "Постичь механизмы темного колдовства значит пустить скверну в себя". {n}Хейнрикс кривит губы.{/n} "Это, бесспорно, варп-мутации. Возможно, некий побочный эффект — поэтому их и доставили сюда, к датчикам и когитаторам. Даже падшими техножрецами, отринувшими {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссию{/g}, движет искаженная тяга к Знанию".

traits.locale_text: "Постичь механизмы темного колдовства значит пустить скверну в себя". {n}Хейнрикс кривит губы.{/n} "Это, бесспорно, варп-мутации. Возможно, некий побочный эффект — поэтому их и доставили сюда, к датчикам и когитаторам. Даже падшими техножрецами, отринувшими {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссию{/g}, движет искаженная тяга к Знанию".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "To know the workings of dark sorcery means allowing corruption into oneself." {n}Heinrix scowls.{/n} "These are warp mutations, no doubt. Perhaps there was some side effect, and that is why they were brought here, to be connected to sensors and cogitators. Even fallen Tech-Priests who have rejected the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} are driven by a perverted hunger for Knowledge."
languages.original_text: "Постичь механизмы темного колдовства значит пустить скверну в себя". {n}Хейнрикс кривит губы.{/n} "Это, бесспорно, варп-мутации. Возможно, некий побочный эффект — поэтому их и доставили сюда, к датчикам и когитаторам. Даже падшими техножрецами, отринувшими {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссию{/g}, движет искаженная тяга к Знанию".

Perhaps there was some side effect, and that is why they were brought here, to be connected to sensors and cogitators. Even fallen tech-priests who have rejected the Omnissiah are driven by a perverted hunger for Knowledge."

Even fallen tech-priests who have rejected the Omnissiah are driven by a perverted hunger for Knowledge."

Perhaps there was some side effect, and that is why they were brought here, to be connected to sensors and cogitators. traits.locale_text: "To know the workings of dark sorcery means allowing corruption into oneself." {n}Heinrix scowls.{/n} "These are warp mutations, no doubt. Perhaps there was some side effect, and that is why they were brought here, to be connected to sensors and cogitators. Even fallen Tech-Priests who have rejected the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} are driven by a perverted hunger for Knowledge."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “想要了解黑暗巫术的原理，就意味着对腐化敞开大门。”{n}海因里希皱起了眉头。{/n}“毫无疑问，这些都是亚空间造成的变异。可能还有一部分副作用，这就是为什么他们被带到了这里，连接到了传感器与沉思者上。即便是那些背弃了{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的堕落技术神甫，也会被对知识的变态渴望所驱使。”
languages.original_text: "To know the workings of dark sorcery means allowing corruption into oneself." {n}Heinrix scowls.{/n} "These are warp mutations, no doubt. Perhaps there was some side effect, and that is why they were brought here, to be connected to sensors and cogitators. Even fallen Tech-Priests who have rejected the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} are driven by a perverted hunger for Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: “想要了解黑暗巫术的原理，就意味着对腐化敞开大门。”{n}海因里希皱起了眉头。{/n}“毫无疑问，这些都是亚空间造成的变异。可能还有一部分副作用，这就是为什么他们被带到了这里，连接到了传感器与思考器上。即便是那些背弃了{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的堕落技术祭司，也会被对知识的变态渴望所驱使。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Conocer el funcionamiento de la hechicería oscura es aceptar la corrupción del propio ser». {n}Heinrix frunce el ceño.{/n} «Estas mutaciones son fruto de la disformidad, de eso no cabe duda. Tal vez se haya producido un efecto secundario que haya motivado su traslado aquí para conectar a esta gente a sensores y cogitadores. Hasta los tecnosacerdotes que han rechazado al {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} sienten una perversa sed de conocimientos».
languages.original_text: "To know the workings of dark sorcery means allowing corruption into oneself." {n}Heinrix scowls.{/n} "These are warp mutations, no doubt. Perhaps there was some side effect, and that is why they were brought here, to be connected to sensors and cogitators. Even fallen Tech-Priests who have rejected the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} are driven by a perverted hunger for Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: «Conocer el funcionamiento de la hechicería oscura es aceptar la corrupción del propio ser». {n}Heinrix frunce el ceño.{/n} «Estas mutaciones son fruto de la disformidad, de eso no cabe duda. Tal vez se haya producido un efecto secundario que haya motivado su traslado aquí para conectar a esta gente a sensores y cogitadores. Hasta los tecnosacerdotes que han rechazado al {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} sienten una perversa sed de conocimientos».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「闇の魔術の働きを知るということは、自分自身に腐敗を許すということだ」{n}ハインリックスは眉をひそめる。{/n}「これらは歪みの変異体に違いありません。おそらく何らかの副作用があって、センサーや考算機に接続するためにここに連れてこられたのでしょう。{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}を拒んだ堕ちたる技術司祭でさえ、知識への倒錯した渇望に駆られるようだ」
languages.original_text: "To know the workings of dark sorcery means allowing corruption into oneself." {n}Heinrix scowls.{/n} "These are warp mutations, no doubt. Perhaps there was some side effect, and that is why they were brought here, to be connected to sensors and cogitators. Even fallen Tech-Priests who have rejected the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} are driven by a perverted hunger for Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: 「闇の魔術の働きを知るということは、自分自身に腐敗を許すということだ」{n}ハインリックスは眉をひそめる。{/n}「これらは歪みの変異体に違いありません。おそらく何らかの副作用があって、センサーや考算機に接続するためにここに連れてこられたのでしょう。{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}を拒んだ堕ちたる技術司祭でさえ、知識への倒錯した渇望に駆られるようだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Wer die Funktionsweise dunkler Zauberei kennt, öffnet sich selbst der Korruption." {n}Heinrix' Blick ist finster.{/n} "Das sind Warp-Mutationen, gar kein Zweifel. Vielleicht eine Nebenwirkung, und deshalb wurden sie hergebracht und an Sensoren und Cogitatoren angeschlossen. Selbst gefallene Techpriester, die dem {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} abgeschworen haben, werden von einem pervertierten Hunger nach Wissen getrieben."
languages.original_text: "To know the workings of dark sorcery means allowing corruption into oneself." {n}Heinrix scowls.{/n} "These are warp mutations, no doubt. Perhaps there was some side effect, and that is why they were brought here, to be connected to sensors and cogitators. Even fallen Tech-Priests who have rejected the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} are driven by a perverted hunger for Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "Wer die Funktionsweise dunkler Zauberei kennt, öffnet sich selbst der Korruption." {n}Heinrix' Blick ist finster.{/n} "Das sind Warp-Mutationen, gar kein Zweifel. Vielleicht eine Nebenwirkung, und deshalb wurden sie hergebracht und an Sensoren und Cogitatoren angeschlossen. Selbst gefallene Techpriester, die dem {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} abgeschworen haben, werden von einem pervertierten Hunger nach Wissen getrieben."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Comprendre la sorcellerie noire revient à accepter la corruption en soi, {n}explique Heinrix en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} Ces mutations ont été causées par le Warp, sans l'ombre d'un doute. Elles ont peut-être eu des effets secondaires, ce qui expliquerait que les cultistes aient amené leurs victimes ici afin de les connecter à des capteurs et cogitateurs. Même les technoprêtres déchus qui ont rejeté l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} conservent leur soif de connaissance, aussi pervertie soit-elle. »
languages.original_text: "To know the workings of dark sorcery means allowing corruption into oneself." {n}Heinrix scowls.{/n} "These are warp mutations, no doubt. Perhaps there was some side effect, and that is why they were brought here, to be connected to sensors and cogitators. Even fallen Tech-Priests who have rejected the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} are driven by a perverted hunger for Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: « Comprendre la sorcellerie noire revient à accepter la corruption en soi, {n}explique Heinrix en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} Ces mutations ont été causées par le Warp, sans l'ombre d'un doute. Elles ont peut-être eu des effets secondaires, ce qui expliquerait que les cultistes aient amené leurs victimes ici afin de les connecter à des capteurs et cogitateurs. Même les technoprêtres déchus qui ont rejeté l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} conservent leur soif de connaissance, aussi pervertie soit-elle. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Karanlık sahirliğin işleyişini anlamak için kişinin yozlaşmayı göze alması gerekir." {n}Heinrix, kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Bunların öteboyut mutasyonları olduğu belli. Belki bir yan etki sebebiyle, sensör ve kavramsayarlara bağlanmak üzere buraya getirilmişlerdir. {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'e{/g} karşı gelip gözden düşen Tekno Rahipler bile İrfan peşinde tükenmez bir iştahla koşarlar."
languages.original_text: "To know the workings of dark sorcery means allowing corruption into oneself." {n}Heinrix scowls.{/n} "These are warp mutations, no doubt. Perhaps there was some side effect, and that is why they were brought here, to be connected to sensors and cogitators. Even fallen Tech-Priests who have rejected the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} are driven by a perverted hunger for Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: “Karanlık sahirliğin işleyişini anlamak için kişinin yozlaşmayı göze alması gerekir.” {n}Heinrix, kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} “Bunların öteboyut mutasyonları olduğu belli. Belki bir yan etki sebebiyle buraya getirilmiş olabilirler. Duyargalara ve kavramsayarlara bağlanmaları için. {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}’e karşı gelip gözden düşmüş Tekno Rahipler bile İrfan peşinde tükenmez bir iştahla koşarlar.”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
